article_text: ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION) The 107-year-old Hulton Bridge over Pittsburgh's Allegheny River was demolished on Tuesday (January 26). Officials say the bridge was rusty, shaky and had to go. A new Hulton Bridge has been constructed. Crews planned to inspect the new bridge to make sure it did not suffer any damage from the implosion of the old one.

article_summary:
ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION) The 107-year-old Hulton Bridge over Pittsburgh's Allegheny River was demolished on Tuesday (January 26).
A new Hulton Bridge has been constructed.
Officials say the bridge was rusty, shaky and had to go.
Crews planned to inspect the new bridge to make sure it did not suffer any damage from the implosion of the old one.
